concept.description: Labels the module com.buschmais.cdo.impl as MODULE and CDO_IMPL.
concept.cypher: MATCH (package:PACKAGE) WHERE package.FQN = "com.buschmais.cdo.impl" SET package:MODULE:CDO_IMPL RETURN package

constraint.description: The module "cdo.impl" must only have dependencies to "cdo.api" and "cdo.spi".
constraint.cypher: MATCH (module:MODULE:CDO_IMPL)-[:CONTAINS*]->(type:TYPE), (otherModule:MODULE)-[:CONTAINS*]->(otherType:TYPE), (type)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(otherType:TYPE) WHERE module<>otherModule AND NOT ( otherModule:CDO_API OR otherModule:CDO_SPI ) RETURN type as Type, otherType as OtherType
